name: The Broken West
description:
The Broken West is a wild-western 2-d open world game where you as a psychotic gunslinger can do whatever you want at any time without remorse. Do you have an insatiable desire to rob the Corner Store? Do It!!! Sure, the police force will attempt to detain you, but what does that matter when you pack heat. 

The NPCs in this game act as members of a hive mind clearly seen in battle sequences as they swarm the enemy in a reckless bloodying manner. Not only do these interactions result in the ultimate loss of lives and gory bloodshed, but they also amount to hours of fun. Join the tens of users playing and enjoy the single-player action that is The Broken West...
